sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import { deleteDeck } from "../utils/api/index.js" function DeckView ({ deck }) { function deleteHandler() { if(window.confirm("Delete this deck? You will not be able to recover it")) deleteDeck(deck.id) } return (
{deck.name}

{deck.cards.length} cards

{deck.description}

View Study
) } export default DeckView
